mapper.insert: insert into caevoteoption (voteOptionId, voteId, optionTitle, optionScore, maxTicked, upperLimit, lowerLimit, optionSn, voteBallotId, voteRoundId) values (#{voteoptionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voteid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optiontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maxticked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upperlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lowerlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{optionsn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{voteballotid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voteroundid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update caevoteoption set voteId = #{voteid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionTitle = #{optiontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionScore = #{optionscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, maxTicked = #{maxticked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upperLimit = #{upperlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lowerLimit = #{lowerlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, optionSn = #{optionsn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, voteBallotId = #{voteballotid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voteRoundId = #{voteroundid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where voteOptionId = #{voteoptionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select voteOptionId, voteId, optionTitle, optionScore, maxTicked, upperLimit, lowerLimit, optionSn, voteBallotId, voteRoundId from caevoteoption where voteOptionId = #{voteoptionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
